name: agilevibecoding-docs
description: AVC Framework Documentation - VitePress documentation site

scripts.docs:sync: cp README.md docs/index.md && cp COMMANDS.md docs/commands.md && sed -i 's|](README.md#|](/#|g' docs/commands.md
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:sync && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:sync && vitepress build docs

author: Nacho Coll
